description: GET request to the "/geocode" endpoint with an "address" parameter containing the address or place you want to geocode
name: geolocate.get_coordinates

description: Get precise latitude and longitude coordinates instantly using our high-accuracy geocoding service. This tool delivers real-time results with support for over 150 languages and automatic country code detection. Unlike basic geocoding solutions, our system provides 99.9% accuracy with enhanced address parsing capabilities for complex locations.
